mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO smbms_user(
id, userCode, userName, userPassword, gender, birthday, phone, address, userRole, createdBy, creationDate, modifyBy, modifyDate, ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userCode}, #{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{userRole}, #{createdBy}, #{creationDate}, #{modifyBy}, #{modifyDate}, );
